entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
